valsi.definition: digit/number: 6 (digit) [six].
$x_1$ is Hanseatic/pertains to the Hanseatic League in aspect $x_2$
$x_1$ reflects Han Chinese [Mandarin, Cantonese, Wu, etc.] culture/nationality/language in aspect $x_2$.
$v_1$ is an envelope for/containing letter $xa_1=v_2$.
Issues a third-person command. Elevates a sumti to ko status.
valsi.notes: In Lojban, there're no convenient ways to issue third-person commands, including cohortatives like "Let's go!", which could be rendered with zo xa'e as lu xa'e mi'o klama li'u. cf. {la'e}, {doi}, {ko}, and {la'ei}.

valsi.definition: opposite of za'o: event contour: refers to the portion of the event which occurs before the natural beginning; starting too early before ...; RefEntity "lt"----.
$b_1=xa_1$ settles in $xa_2$
$j_1$ is the home address of $xa_1=j_1$ with address system $j_3$.
$x_{1}$ dwells/lives/resides/abides at/inhabits/is a resident of location/habitat/nest/home/abode $x_{2}$.
$xa_1$=$m_1$ is the mate of $xa_1$=$m_2$ with property $m_3$ in pair $xa_2$.
$x_1$ is most/a majority/more than half of $x_2$ in property $x_3$ by amount $x_4$ by standard $x_5$.
$x_1$ is a minority/less than half of $x_2$ in property $x_3$ by amount $x_4$ by standard $x_5$.
$x_{1}$ is exactly/approximately a quarter of $x_{2}$ by standard $x_{3}$.
$xa_1=c_1$ is a gun/cannon/firearm launching projectile $c_2$ propelled by $c_3$, for use against $xa_2$ by $xa_3$.
valsi.notes: jvajvo definition; Gismu deep structure is "xarci gi'e cecla"

valsi.definition: $g_1=x_1$ is a club/cudgel/truncheon/bludgeon made of $g_2$ used against $x_2$ by $x_3$.
$x_{1}$ is exactly/approximately half/semi-/demi-/hemi- of $x_{2}$ by standard $x_{3}$.
$xa_2=b_1=m_1$ is adolescent/pubescent/in puberty/maturing in physical/bodily development-quality $m_2$ (ka).
valsi.notes: Cf. {xadni}, {binxo}, {makcu}, {bixma'u}, {bavyfarvi}, {citnau}. Between prepubescent child and post-pubescent adult.

valsi.definition: $x_1=m_1$ is the waist of $x_2=m_2$.
$x_{1}$ is a/the body/corpus/corpse of $x_{2}$; (adjective:) $x_{1}$ is corporal/corporeal.
$c_1=xa_1$ is tall / has a long body by standard $c_3$.
$c_1$ is/are a/the physical sport(s) exercised/played by $x_2$.
$j_1=xa_2$ competes with opponent $j_2$ in sport/athletics $j_3$ for gain $j_4=p_3$.
$x_{1}$ hungers for $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ needs/wants food/fuel $x_{2}$.
$j_1$ is optimistic about $j_3$.
$xa_1=z_1$ is better than $z_2$ for $xa_2$ by standard $xa_3$, by amount $z_4$.
$xa_1=m_1$ is worse than/not as good as $m_2$ for $xa_2$ by standard $xa_3$, by amount $m_4$.
$t_1=x_1$ is the best among set/range $t_4$ for $x_2$ by standard $x_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a oboe/clarinet/saxophone [reed musical instrument] with reed $x_{2}$.
$x_1$ is a clarinet with reed $x_2$.
$x_1$ is a saxophone with reed $x_2$.
$x_1$ is a reed of species/variety $x_2$.
$f_1$ progresses towards $f_2=x_1$ from $f_3$ through stages $f_4$.
$g_1$ (agent) improves $z_1=x_1$ for $x_2$ by amount $z_3$.
$r_1$ (event/state/process) improves $z_1=x_1$ for $x_2$ by amount $z_3$ under conditions $r_3$.
they.(repeat RefEntity "gt"1 preceding sumti)
valsi.notes: repeats two or more preceding sumti, not one plural sumti

valsi.definition: $g_1$ causes event $x_1$ which injures/harms/damages victim $x_2$ in property $x_3$ (ka) resulting in injury $x_4$ (state).
$x_{1}$ is funny/comical to $x_{2}$ in property/aspect $x_{3}$ (nu/ka); $x_{3}$ is what is funny about $x_{1}$ to $x_{2}$.
valsi.notes: Also: $x_1$ is a comedian (= {xampre}, {xamseljibri} for a professional comedian). ($x_1$ can be a person/object or an abstraction; be careful about possible sumti-raising); See also {bebna}, {cisma}, {cmila}, {fenki}, {zdile}.

valsi.definition: $c_1=x_1$ is a/the grunt of a pig/hog/swine of species $x_2$ expressing $c_3$ (property).
$z_1$ is the snout of pig/hog/swine/[boar] $z_2=x_1$ of species $x_2$, with nostril(s)/nasal passage(s) $z_3$.
number/quantity: 6,000 expressed with comma.
$x_{1}$ (event) uses up/depletes/consumes/[wastes] $x_{2}$ [resource].
$x_1=b_1$ is a saloon/pub/bar primarily serving alcoholic beverages to $x_2=b_3$.
$x_1$ is drunk/tipsy in manner $x_2$ from drinking $x_3$ (alcohol).
$x_{1}$ uses levity/is non-serious/frivolous about $x_{2}$ (abstraction).
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/contains/is made of alcohol of type $x_{2}$ from source/process $x_{3}$.
$xa_1=c_1$ is alcoholic of alcohol type $xa_2$ from source/process $xa_3$.
$x_{1}$ (person) is panicked by crisis $x_{2}$ (event/state).
$n_1$ is alcohol poisoning of $x_2=v_2$ from alcohol type $x_3=xa_2$.
$p_1$ drinks to much alcohol of type $p_2$ from $p_3$ by standard $d_3$; $p_1$ is a drunk
$x_1$ pertains to the Sikh culture/religion/ethos in aspect $x_2$
$v_1$ throws up $v_2$ due to alcohol of type $xa_2$.
$g_1$ does/brings about event/state $g_2=xa_1$ which is funny/comical to $xa_2$ in property/aspect $xa_3$ (nu/ka).
$x_{1}$ (object/event) is good/beneficial/nice/[acceptable] for $x_{2}$ by standard $x_{3}$.
quantified selbri: convert 6 to ordinal selbri; $x_{1}$ is sixth among $x_{2}$ ordered by rule $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is $x_{2}$ ampere(s) [metric unit] in current (default is 1) by standard $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is a sea/ocean/gulf/[atmosphere] of planet $x_{2}$, of fluid $x_{3}$; (adjective:) $x_{1}$ is marine.
$x_1$ tells/expresses joke $x_2$ (sedu'u/text/lu'e concept) for audience $x_3$ via expressive medium $x_4$.
$b_1$ is a Signed Language used by $x_2=b_2$ to express/communicate $b_3$ (si'o/du'u, not quote).
valsi.notes:
(x1) "Sign Language" in the sense of visually transmitting patterns using hands, arms, body, and facial expression to convey meaning. (i.e., Manual communication, body language.) (x2) "Sign Language speaker." (x3) "thing expressed in Sign Language."
Cf. {xance}, {bangu}

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is a/the hand [body-part] of $x_{2}$; [metaphor: manipulating tool, waldo].
$j_1$ is a bracelet adorning $j_2=xa_1=c_1$.
valsi.notes: Bracelets are used not only for fashion but also for medical and identification purposes, such as allergy bracelets and hospital patient-identification tags. Cf. {jadni}.

valsi.definition: $x_1=c_1$ is a wrist of $x_2=c_2$.
$c_1$ is a fingernail of finger $c_2=d_1$ of body $d_3$.
$g_1$ masturbates/fucks $g_2$ with her/his hand(s).
$x_1$ is a hangul (Korean alphabet) of sound $x_2$.
$x_1$ grasps/holds/clutches/seizes/grips $x_2$ using hand(s).
$x1=r1=j1=xa2$ handshakes $x2=r2=j2=xa2$
$s_1$ hold hands/are hand-in-hand.
$m_1=j_2$ is a moose/Eurasian elk of species $m_2$
valsi.notes: Alces alces noted for its hand-shaped antlers. See also {mirlruapiti}

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is nervous/anxious about $x_{2}$ (abstraction) under conditions $x_{3}$.
$x_1=d_1$ is anxious/earnestly desirous for $x_2=d_2$ (abstract), the purpose being $d_3$.
$x_1$ is $x_2$ handfuls in volume/amount (default is 1) by standard $x_3$.
number/quantity: 60 [sixty].
number/quantity: 600 [six hundred].
$x_{1}$ [concept] exists in the imagination of/is imagined by/is imaginary to $x_{2}$.
valsi.notes: Also (adjective:) $x_1$ is mental (one sense), $x_1$ is unreal (one sense); in spite of the synonym, note that $x_1$ is imaginary does not imply that it doesn't exist in the real world; the definition is crafted so that one can talk about imaginary things without claiming that they thereby don't exist. See also {fatci}, {senva}, {sucta}, {zasti}, {cfika}, {dacti}, {menli}, {sidbo}.

valsi.definition: $g_1=s_1=xa_2$ fist-fucks/performs fisting on $g_2$ in opening $s_3$.
$s_1=xa_2$ waves hand.
$c_1$ is the thumbnail of body $t_3=j_2$.
$x_1=g_3$ is a flashlight/portable light source for illuminating $g_2$, emitting light form $x_3=g_1$.
$x_{1}$ is an elephant of species/breed $x_{2}$.
$m_1$ is elephant/mammoth ivory from species/breed $xa_2$.
$z_1=x_2$ gives applause to plan/action $z_2$ (object/event).
$x_{1}$ is a weapon/arms for use against $x_{2}$ by $x_{3}$.
$x_1$ is an artichoke of species/variety $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ is a pig/hog/swine/[boar] [pork/ham/bacon-producer] of species/breed $x_{2}$.
valsi.notes: Sow (= {fetxarju}), boar (= {nakyxarju}), pork (= {xajre'u}), piglet (= {citxarju}). See also {mabru}, {cange}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is stubborn/willfully opposing/resisting $x_{2}$ about $x_{3}$ (event/state).
valsi.notes: $x_2$ may be a person, a state or condition, or a force; the essence is willful resistance. See also {tinsa}, {pante}, {bapli}, {fapro}.

valsi.definition: $p_1 = x_2$ imagines / visualizes imaginary subject / concept $p_2 = x_1$.
valsi.notes: Not limited to visual imagination. Made from {xanri} + {pensi}; technically should be selxarpei, but I can't see "xanri pensi" having any other meaning.

valsi.definition: $xa_1=p_1$ is a character/role/imaginary person created by $xa_2$.
Sea
$k_1$ is a beach/coast of sea $xa_1=k_2$ on landmass $k_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a donkey/jackass of species/breed $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a/the sweat/perspiration from body $x_{2}$, excreted by gland(s)/organs $x_{3}$.
$x_1$ is under sea $x_2$ in reference frame $x_3$.
$c_1$ is a sea worm of species $c_2$.
$d_1$ is a torpedo launched by $d_2$.
$j_1$ is a sea mine with explosive material/principle $j_2$.
$j_1$ is a crab/lobster/crayfish/shrimp/krill/[marine crustacean] of species $j_2$.
$s_1$ is the oceanography/marine science of planet $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ is a letter/missive/[note] to intended audience $x_{2}$ from author/originator $x_{3}$ with content $x_{4}$.
valsi.notes: (cf. notci, which has places in a different order; the emphasis in xatra is on the communication between author and recipient, and not the content, which in a letter may not easily be categorized to a 'subject'; ciska, mrilu, papri)

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is $10^{-18}$ of $x_{2}$ in dimension/aspect $x_{3}$ (default is units).
$xa_1=z_1$ is better than $z_2$ for $xa_2$ by standard $xa_3$, by amount $z_4$.
valsi.notes: Cf. {xamgu}, {zmadu}, {xagmau}, {xagrai}. The {xagmau} form is far more frequently used.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is a Saturday of week $x_2$ in calendar $x_3$.
June.
$x_1$ is June/the sixth month of year $x_2$ in calendar $x_3$.
$j_1$ has the rank of Brigadier General/Brigadier/Rear Admiral/Commodore (equivalent of NATO OF-6) in military unit /organization $j_2$.
valsi.notes: Cf. {xa}, {moi}, {jatna}, {jemja'a}, {vairsoi}, {zelmoija'a}, {mumymoija'a}. Based on STANAG 2116: NATO Codes for Grades of Military Personnel.

valsi.definition: number/quantity: 64,000 expressed with comma.
Saturn.
$p_1$ is the sixth closest planet (default is Saturn if p2 is the Sun) revolving around $p_2$ (default is the Sun), with planetary characteristics $p_3$, orbital parameters $p_4$.
$c1=$da1 is a Vulpix [six-tailed fox Pok√©mon]
$x_{1}$ reflects Asiatic culture/nationality/geography in aspect $x_{2}$.
5th conversion; switch 1st/5th places.
benji modal, 5th place (medium) transmitted via ...
$x_{1}$ hates/despises $x_{2}$ (object/abstraction); $x_{1}$ is full of hate for $x_{2}$; $x_{2}$ is odious to $x_{1}$.
valsi.notes: $x_1$ is hateful (one sense); $x_2$ is hateful (different sense). See also {djica}, {nitcu}, {rigni}, {prami}, {nelci}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ reflects Hebrew/Jewish/Israeli culture/nationality/language in aspect $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a hundred [100; $10^2$] of $x_{2}$ in dimension/aspect $x_{3}$ (default is units).
$x_{1}$ is a/the jaw [body-part] of $x_{2}$.
digit/number: hex digit E (decimal 14) [fourteen]
valsi.notes: Used as an alternative to {rei} to avoid confusion with {re}.

valsi.definition: $c_1$ is a/the chin [body part] of $x_2$.
$r_1=x_2$ is an alligator/caiman of species/type $r_2$
$x_1$ is the beard of $x_2$.
klama modal, 5th place by transport mode ...
$c_1$ is a blackbird of species $c_2$.
$x_{1}$ is black/extremely dark-colored [color adjective].
$x_1$ is is made of/contains/is a quantity of a black/very-dark colored carbonated beverage/soda of cola-flavor, of brand $x_2$.
valsi.notes: Not any black, carbonated beverage, but one with cola-flavor, like Coca-Cola (={kokaKOlys}), Pepsi, Julmust (=a soft drink that is mainly consumed in Sweden around Christmas;=(sfe'ero) xisyjbenunsla xeksodva) or similar. Another flavor may be added and expressed as a tanru, as long as the combination doesn't differ too much from the characteristics of xeksodva.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is ho-shou-wu/fleeceflower of variety $x_2$.
$x_5=b_1$ transfers/sends/transmits $x_2=b_2$ to receiver $x_3=b_3$ from transmitter/origin $x_4=b_4$ via means/medium $x_1=b_5$.
$b_2$ (person/animal/plant) digests $p_2$ with output $p_3$ passing through stage $p_4$.
$x_5=b_1$ carries/hauls/bears/transports cargo $x_2=b_2$ to $x_3=b_3$ from $x_4=b_4$ over path $x_1=b_5$; $x_5=b_1$ is a carrier/porter.
$x_5=b_1$ is a wave/periodic pattern in medium $x_2=b_2$, with wave-form $x_3=b_3$, wave-length $x_4=b_4$ and frequency $x_1=b_5$.
$j_2$ is a radio band with borders $j_1$.
$x_1$ is a class [biology] with genus $x_2$, family $x_3$, order $x_4$, and with species $x_5$.
valsi.notes: For biological cathegory in general (=mivyske klesi), domain (=?), kingdom (={seljimcymivykle}), phylum (={jicymivykle}), class (=this definition), order (={veljutsi}), family (={terjutsi}), genus (={seljutsi}), species (={jutsi}).

valsi.definition: Using means/vehicle $x_{1}$, to $x_{2}$, from $x_{3}$, via $x_{4}$, goes $x_{5}$.
$x_{1}$ reflects Greek/Hellenic culture/nationality/language in aspect $x_{2}$.
Switzerland.
Switzerland.
$x_1$ is Swiss in aspect $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ (person) is kind to $x_{2}$ in actions/behavior $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ regrets/rues (abstraction) $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ is regretful/rueful/sorry/[remorseful] about $x_{2}$.
valsi.notes: Also: $x_1$ feels remorse about $x_2$ (= {zugyxe'u}). (cf. cmavo list .u'u, zungi)

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is Greece.
$x_{1}$ is $10^{18}$ of $x_{2}$ in dimension/aspect $x_{3}$ (default is units).
subscript; attaches a numer of letteral string following as a subscript onto grammar structures.
$x_1$ is a gibbon of species $x_2$.
$x_1$ is a gibbon of species $x_2$.
$xa_1=c_1$ is an artillery gun for use against $xa_2$ by $xa_3$, launching projectile $c_2$ propelled by $c_3$.
$c_1=xi_3$ is a wheel tyre/tire.
valsi.notes: The rubber source can be expressed with "ra'i ...", the composition with "ma'e ...".

valsi.definition: $k_1$ is a military armoured car propelled by $k_3$.
$t_1$=$xi_1$ is a board with wheels/skateboard/longboard/snakeboard [default skateboard], of material/property $t_2$ with wheels [material/property] $xi_3$.
valsi.notes: From {tanbo}, {djacu}, {boxna} (b2-b5 subsumed). Also longboard (=clani xilta'o), streetboard, snakeboard etc.

valsi.definition: $v_{1}$=$x_{1}$ is a rotavirus of species/breed/defining property $v_{2}$ capable of infecting [at] $v_{3}$.
valsi.notes: x2 may be abu (A), by (B), cy (C),dy (D) or ebu (E). Rotavirus A, the most common, causes more than 90% of infections in humans. See also {vidru}, {norvokovidru} and {remjinkytoldu'evidru}.

valsi.definition: Indian Ocean.
$x_1=b_1$ is the Hindi language used by $b_2$ to communicate $b_3$
$x_{1}$ reflects Hindi language/culture/religion in aspect $x_{2}$.
valsi.notes: Defaults to not include Urdu; Indian (Bharat) nationality may be implied (when constrained by xingu'e). See also {srito}, {xurdo}, {bengo}.

valsi.definition: $x_1=g_1=b_1$ is the Indian English language used by $b_2$ to express/communicate $b_3$ (si'o/du'u, not quote).
$x_1=g_1$ is India.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of ink of color/pigment $x_{2}$ used by writing device $x_{3}$.
$x_1$ is a hippopotamus of species/breed $x_2$.
$c_1$ neighs.
$m_1$ is a mass of set $m_2$ with an odd number of members $m_3$
$x_1$ is a hiragana (Japanese syllabary) of sound $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ is a horse/equine/[colt/mare/stallion/pony] of species/breed $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a noble with nobility standard $x_{2}$.
$s_1$ is a horse cavalryman of army $s_2$.
$z_1$ is a stable for horse/equine/[colt/mare/stallion/pony] $z_2=x_1$ of species/breed $x_2$
$n_1$ is Easter celebrated by $s_1$ with activities $s_3$
$x_{1}$ is a wheel [tool] of device/vehicle $x_{2}$, made of materials/having properties $x_{3}$.
$x_1=m_1=xr_1$ is a Christian (Catholic/Protestant/Anglican/etc.) church at location/serving area $x_3=m_3$
valsi.notes: Doesn't tosmabru due to -ls- being a impermissible initial pair and doesn't distinguish the type of Christianity. cf. {xriso} and {malsi}

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ reflects Hispano-American culture/nationalities in aspect $x_{2}$.
valsi.notes: Refers to Spanish-speaking Latin-American countries, not Brazil/Guyana. See also {merko}, {mexno}, {spano}, {ketco}, {bemro}, {gento}.

valsi.definition: $n_1$ is Christmas Eve of Christmas Day $n_2$ at location $n_3$.
$d_1$ is Christmas Day at location $d_3$ in calendar $d_4$.
$n_1$ is the Christmas celebrated by $s_1$ with activities $s_3$.
$d_1$ is spiteful/malevolent/malicious/mean to/towards $x_2$.
$x_1$ suffers from $x_2$ (event, process, object).
$f_1=xl_1$ is unlucky/unfortunate for $f_2=xl_2$ by standerd $xl_3$.
$j_1$ is pessimistic about $j_3$.
$x_{1}$ is bad for $x_{2}$ by standard $x_{3}$; $x_{1}$ is poor/unacceptable to $x_{2}$.
valsi.notes: Be careful to distinguish between a bad/unacceptable event, and a bad/unacceptable agent: $x_1$ does poorly (= lenu ko'a gasnu cu xlali and not normally ko'a {xlali}). See also {palci}, {mabla}, {xamgu}, {betri}.

valsi.definition: $x_1=m_1$ is worse than $m_2$ for $x_2$ by standard $x_3$, by amount $m_3$.
x1=m1 is better/[less bad] than $m_2$ for $x_2$ by standard $x_3$, by amount $m_4$.
$j_1$ is cynical/suspicious about the motives of $m_3$ with regard to action/event $m_2=j_3$.
$t_1=x_1$ is the worst among set/range $t_4$ for $x_2$ by standard $x_3$.
$t_1=xl_1$ is bad weather at place/region $t_2$ for $x_3=xl_2$ by standard $x_4=xl_3$.
$x_1$ is September of year $x_2$ in calendar $x_3$.
$x_{1}$ (agent) influences/lures/tempts $x_{2}$ into action/state $x_{3}$ by influence/threat/lure $x_{4}$.
valsi.notes: Also impresses; $x_4$ is alluring (= {trivelxlu} for place reordering); $x_3$ may be an achieved action/state, or an attempt to perform an action/enter a state). ($x_3$ and $x_4$ are normally events or states); See also {djica}, {mukti}, {trina}, {jitro}, {sazri}, {tcica}, {xance}, {stidi}, {kajde}, {maksi}.

valsi.definition: digit/number: number/digit/lerfu question.
Loglan toggle: Toggles text to TLI Loglan; marks following text as TLI Loglan.
valsi.notes: The proposal also includes an experimental Loglan Little word ``hoa'' (which toggles text to Lojban).

valsi.definition: elliptical/unspecified number.
Extracts selbri from a tag, inverse of fi'o
valsi.notes: xo'i bau is equivalent to bangu, xo'i fi'o broda is equivalent to broda

valsi.definition: attitudinal modifier: sarcastically - sincerely
valsi.notes: There is no good attitudinal for sarcasm. Chosen for its similarity to {zo'o}.

valsi.definition: Xod.
valsi.notes: A name used by Charles Hope.

valsi.definition: \emph{1.} to the degree of...When prefixed by a number, turns the number into a selbri that expresses some truth value between zero and one, inclusive. \emph{2.} it may or may not be the case that ...
valsi.notes: This experimental cmavo form has been assigned meanings several times independently. The first sense, suggested on the Lojban Wiki by Xod, generalizes {na} and {ja'a} by creating a scale between them. This can be seen as an implementation of fuzzy logic. This sense has now been retired in favor of subscripting {ja'a} with {xi}. The other sense, apparently invented by Nora Lechevalier some time earlier (at least before 1997), is not intended seriously, but rather as a kind of reductio-ad-absurdum. As it makes any sentence true, regardless of the content, it shows that a language that is excessively free to interpretation is impossible to express anything in.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is an ocotillo of species $x_2$
Hong Kong.
$x_1$ is sesame of species/variety $x_2$.
$x_1$ is a saddlebag/pair of saddlebags to use on animal/vehicle $x_2$.
Jorge.
$x_{1}$ is a hotel/inn/hostel at location $x_{2}$ operated by $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ reflects Arabic-speaking culture/nationality in aspect $x_{2}$.
$c_1=p_3$ draws picture $c_2=p_1$ on medium $c_3=p_4$ with implement $c_4$ depicting $p_2$.
$k_1=p_4$ is an illustrated magazine/journal with content $k_2=p_1$ published by $k_3$ for audience $k_4$.
$x_{1}$ (event) injures/harms/damages victim $x_{2}$ in property $x_{3}$ (ka) resulting in injury $x_{4}$ (state).
$c_2=p_1$ is drawn by artist $c_1=p_3$ on medium $c_3=p_4$ using implement $c_4$ depicting $p_2$.
$t_1=p_1$ is an image of $t_2=p_2$ created by agent $p_3$ on medium $p_4$.
$b_1=m_1=s_1$ is creole used by $b_2$ to express/communicate $b_3$, created from sources including $m_2$.
$x_1=min_1$ is a blender/mixer for ingredients $x_2=mix_2$ to produce mixture $x_3=mix_1$.
$x_{1}$ pertains to the Christian religion/culture/nationality in aspect $x_{2}$.
Christ.
$x_1$ is the Christian Bible of Christian denomination $x_2$
$x_1$ is buckwheat of variety $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of buckwheat/rhubarb/sorrel grass of species/strain $x_{2}$.
$b_1=x_1$ takes/carries back $b_2=x_2$ to origin/earlier state $b_3=x_3$ from $b_4=x_4$ over path $b_5$.
$c_1$ requests/asks $c_2$ to go back/return to $x_2$ from $x_3$.
valsi.notes: Cf. {xruti}, {cpedu}. Based on proposed redefinition of {xruti} by xorxes: x1 returns to x2 from x3.

valsi.definition: $g_1$ causes $x_1$ to return to state $x_2$ from state $x_3$.
valsi.notes: Cf. {xruti}, {gasnu}. Based on proposed redefinition of {xruti} by xorxes: x1 returns to state x2 from state x3.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is a turkey [food/bird] of species/breed $x_{2}$.
$x_1=xr_1=xr_2=k_1$ returns to earlier location $x_2=xr_3=k_2$ from $x_3=xr_4=k_3$ via route $x_4=k_4$ using means/vehicle $x_5=k_5$.
$x_{1}$ is a/the flower/blossom/bloom [body-part] of plant/species $x_{2}$; (adjective:) $x_{1}$ is floral.
$x_1$ is a quantity of ranunculus/buttercup/spearwort/water crowfoot of species/strain $x_2$
$x_1$ is a quantity of lavender of species/strain $x_2$
$x_{1}$ (agent) returns $x_{2}$ to origin/earlier state $x_{3}$ from $x_{4}$; $x_{1}$ moves/gives $x_{2}$ back to $x_{3}$ from $x_{4}$.
valsi.notes: $x_2$ goes back/reverts/Retreats. to $x_3$ (= {se'ixru} for agent self-returning to a previous location/situation: renumber places in the lujvo); ($x_3$ may be a location or a person or an event/situation; the latter may also be expressed with {krefu} or {rapli} and a causative like {rinka}/{rikygau}). See also {benji}, {krefu}, {rapli}, {rinka}.

valsi.definition: Croatia.
discursive: true-false question.
$x_1$ is an element of compound $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ is an instance of substance/chemical/drug $x_{2}$ (individual or mass) with purity $x_{3}$.
$x_1$ is meleagrology based on methodology $x_2$.
$x_1=t_1$ is an iron for straightening cloths $x_2=b_1=xu_1$ of material $x_3=b_2$.
$x_1 = c_1$ is a gun/chemically launched metal slug throwing weapon for use against $x_2$ by $x_3$; weapon fires metallic objects $x_4$ using chemical propellant $x_5$.
$x_1$ is a quantity of concrete made from ingredients $x_2$.
$x_1$ is chemistry based on methodology $x_2$.
$s_1$ is a molecule of chemical $x_2$.
$s_1$ is high/stoned/trips on drug $xu_1$, hallucinating/experiencing $s_2$ (fact/idea/event/state).
$r_1=x_1$ catalyzes chemical reaction $r_2=s_2$ under conditions $r_3$.
$t_1$ is a chemical compound of $t_2$ and $t_3$.
$b_1=x_1$ is pink.
$x_{1}$ is red/crimson/ruddy [color adjective].
$x_1$ is a cherry [berry] of species/variety $x_2$
$x_1=b_1$ is the Urdu language used by $b_2$ to express/communicate $b_3$ (si'o/du'u, not quote).
$x_{1}$ reflects Urdu language/culture/nationality in aspect $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ (agent) asserts/claims/declares $x_{2}$ (du'u) is true [can be used for epistemology of authority].
valsi.notes: Also: $x_1$ states/says that/affirms/purports to know that $x_2$. (cf. natfe which is propositional and non-agentive, nupre)

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is vetiver of species/variety $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ is smooth/even/[soft/silky] in texture/regularity.
letteral for x.
Hong Kong.
